Package accounts

Class CurrentAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • accounts.Account
      • accounts.CurrentAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operations
    public class CurrentAccount
extends Account
    This class extends the Account class implementing all the abstract method. This class is built on the below provided definition of current account. A checking account is a type of bank account that is designed for everyday money transactions. A checking account does not have any withdrawal restrictions, but no interest is earned. It also provides features like overdraft with no additional fees.

      • Fields inherited from interface interfaces.Operations
